item.description:
On Sept 18th, from 2:00-3:30 PM, Pandemonium Books in Cambridge is hosting a reading of local authors for the tenth anniversary of Strange Horizons.

According to Pandemonium, authors scheduled to appear include Mary Alexandra Agner, Angela Ambroz, Francesca Forrest, Theodora Goss, Elizabeth Lee, Jennifer Pelland, Margaret Ronald, Vandana Singh, Sonya Taaffe, and Connie Wilkins. You may have met some of them, so it should be pretty exciting to see your favorite local hero.

There are plenty of coffee shops in Central Square to gather in afterward. We could also eat at Mary Chung's. Or your favorite place nearby.

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: Meetup at the Strange Horizons reading
